tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback ( 
    feedback_id INT, 
    customer_id INT, 
    survey_id INT, 
    feedback_text TEXT, 
    rating INT 
);

CREATE TABLE promotions (
    promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    promotion_name VARCHAR(50),
    discount_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE Feedback (   id INT,   customer_id INT,   feedback_text TEXT,   rating INT );
CREATE TABLE Surveys (   survey_id INT,   survey_name TEXT,   start_date DATE,   end_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE Promotions (   promotion_id INT,   promotion_name TEXT,   discount DECIMAL(5,2) );
CREATE TABLE Customers (   customer_id INT,   customer_name TEXT,   email TEXT,   phone_number TEXT );
CREATE TABLE Orders (   order_id INT,   customer_id INT,   order_date DATE,   total_amount DECIMAL(8,2) );
